channel.title: How to let Friends Join Server?
channel.description:
Ok, i'm all new to this stuff, so could someone plz tell me how to let my Friends join my server, and how can i watch my ip? And i don't know how to create my own server, cuz if i click start new server, it says that i have an server now, but how do i edit it? Plz tell me the awnsers, atleast 2. :eek: :confused: :|
oh, and i also have an site with forum [url=http://www.freewebs.com/runepray]www.freewebs.com/runepray[/url] :)

item.title: How to let Friends Join Server?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Download Hamachi if you’re a starter…
www.hamachi.cc

Otherwise, portforward if you need to, then make an ip from www.no-ip.org

Then put your server online. Blah blah blah
